title: Seikai no Monshou - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Romance   Sci-fi   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Calm Protagonist   Cosmic Wars   Determined Protagonist   Genetic Modifications   Male Protagonist   Outer Space   Wars
author: Morioka Hiroyuki
description: Planet Martine is suddenly attacked! The alien invaders are known as the Abh. They are of human origin, but have been genetically modified so that each Abh has superior talent, skill, beauty, and longevity. Martine's president surrenders completely in the face of the Abh's awesome military power. Through a bizarre twist of fate, his son Jinto becomes a nobleman in the Abh's vast, intergalactic empire.>
